ai-kp3:1.1_0: “In this body there is head hair, body hair, nails, teeth, skin, flesh, sinews, bones, bone marrow, kidneys, heart, liver, diaphragm, spleen, lungs, intestines, mesentery, undigested food, feces, brain, bile, phlegm, pus, blood, sweat, fat, tears, grease, saliva, snot, synovial fluid, urine.”
ai-kp3:2.1_0: head hairs, body hairs, nails, teeth, skin,
ai-kp3:2.5_0: bile, phlegm, pus, blood, sweat, fat,
ai-kp3:2.6_0: tears, grease, spit, mucus, synovial fluid, urine.
